expt_aim: to see if we can detect similarities in meanings of sentences
sent2: I really enjoy going sailing with my father.
Three of the players were skillful.
He thought the shirt was excellent.
All of the students were tired.
The weekend was sunny and windy.
sent1: I really enjoy walking in the woods alone.
I really don't like eating out at upscale places..
Two but not three of the players were skillful.
The cookies were sometimes but not always chocolate.
He thought the shirt was good.
She liked but didn't love the movie.
Some of the students were tired.
The weekend was either sunny or windy.
